documentation.title: Scope Closing Brace
documentation.standard: Indentation of a closing brace must match the indentation of the line containing the opening brace.

code.title: Valid: Closing brace aligned with line containing opening brace.
Invalid: Closing brace misaligned with line containing opening brace.

documentation.standard: Closing brace must be on a line by itself.

code.title: Valid: Close brace on its own line.
Invalid: Close brace on a line containing other code.
